DOC.brief_summary: This trial investigate efficacy safety highly purified human chorionic gonadotropin ( HP-hCG ) recombinant human chorionic gonadotropin ( rhCG ) trigger final follicular maturation woman undergo controlled ovarian stimulation
DOC.brief_title: A Randomised Trial Using Highly Purified Human Chorionic Gonadotropin ( HP-hCG ) Recombinant Human Chorionic Gonadotropin ( rhCG ) Women Undergoing Controlled Ovarian Stimulation
DOC.criteria: Premenopausal females age 18 39 year Documented history infertility Body mass index ( BMI ) 17.5 32.0 kg/m2 Regular menstrual cycle Known endometriosis stage III IV Known polycystic ovarian syndrome ( PCOS ) History recurrent miscarriage History three previous control ovarian stimulation cycle
